hero.title: Valery Bogovich

education.specialty: Electrician for repair and maintenance of electrical equipment

experience.description: Creation of design documentation for machines and equipment for semiconductor wafer production
Connection of lighting on power lines
Various works on the territory of the football club: painting and installation of fences, marking the football field, etc.
Auxiliary work on the production of parts for snow removal machines
Auxiliary work in the workshop for the production of reinforced concrete structures

coffeeShop.title: Coffee Shop
